The post: s caption stating that Ferdinand Marcos holds the record for the highest score ever in the Bar exam.
The photo in the post showing a newspape: s front page with a headline stating "U.P. TOPS BAR" and the masthead reading "The Philippine Collegian" with the text "Marcos - Bar Topnotcher - 1939" below it.
The list of Marcos: purported bar examination grades, including perfect scores in Criminal Law, International Law, and Legal Ethics, and a high average of 98.01%.
The confirmation from the Philippine Sup: a former associate justice of the court, who scored an average of 96.7% in the 1954 bar exam.
